text:
While Arrow star Stephen Amell helped kick off The CW’s expanding continuity of DC Comics-inspired television shows, his character Oliver Queen/Green Arrow has found himself increasingly overshadowed by his super-powered peers on The Flash, Supergirl and Legends of Tomorrow. However, unlike said peers, Oliver’s uber-athletic parkour-trained crime-fighting skills are attributed to his actor’s abilities. Now, Amell will get a chance to showcase his skills in real life!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baHfmHeySkE

NBC has released a sneak preview of Stephen Amell’s imminently airing American Ninja Warrior run. While the clip obviously doesn’t divulge the ultimate outcome, it does show Amell absolutely crushing the early – but nevertheless difficult – obstacles of the initial course with athletic ease. Even if Amell ultimately ends up taking an ignominious header into the drink below, the preview already proves that what we see of Oliver Queen’s training on Arrow is pretty much ALL Stephen Amell.

Amell’s American Ninja Warrior run will air as part of NBC’s upcoming annual celebration of Red Nose Day, showcasing a celebrity edition of the obstacle course mainstay series. As the preview reveals, Stephen Amell will shed Oliver Queen and the Green Arrow to participate in television’s ultimate obstacle course proving ground. The special edition will pair celebrities with veteran participants called “Elite Ninjas,” who will act in a coaching capacity as the celebs navigate the elaborately arduous courses. Amell will be partnered with the show’s female standout and poster-woman Kacy Cantanzaro.

Additionally, the Red Nose Day edition of American Ninja Warrior will see celebs Erika Christensen (Parenthood) pair with Flip Rodriguez, Derek Hough (Dancing with the Stars) with Daniel Gil, Natalie Morales (NBC’s Today) with Grant McCartney, Ashton Eaton (Olympic gold medalist) with Kevin Bull, Nikki Glaser (comedian/host) with Jessie Graff, Nick Swisher (former Yankees outfielder) with Drew Drechsel, Jeff Dye (comedian) with Meagan Martin and film star Mena Suvaru (American Beauty, the American Pie movies) with Natalie Duran.
title: Arrow Star Stephen Amell Runs American Ninja Warrior Course

meta_data.description: Arrow’s Stephen Amell tests his parkour training in an upcoming celebrity edition of American Ninja Warrior.
